title: Gnar with runaans hurricane
body: Is that possible guys?  Yes , No? Pro and contra?

replies.body:
Nope.
Pros:
- W proc on 3 targets and that's about it

Cons:
-no point in building crit
-no use of the item as a whole in mega form because you're melee
-takes up an item slot that can be used for something more useful and leaves you rather squishy

when you're in mega you basically have 1 less item
